column5: DCIX Given the financial position of DCIX getting a bank line with a favorable rate is highly probable They only need 40MM if they use 10MM of their cash Given that they can liquidate and have over 100MM they are in great shape They can put the 2 new boats plus one other ship up for collateral and their LTV is 50 for those 3 and there would still be 3 ships free and clear I still wish they would have liquidated for 225 per share but this is a roll of the dice that profitability plus an upward movement in shipping rates and ship values will bring more than that Palios is banking 10MM on that fact In fact if he liquidates the company in a year he doubles his money I also like that this is a straightforward deal I bought 30K shares today at a 15 discount from Palios shares

DCIX Looks like we are acquiring Maersk Jeddah and Maersk Jamnagar Oh the ironies for this boardI was hoping for a liquidation However Palios effectively bought 10MM shares for 105 Company is on the hook for another 50MM Assume they use 15 MM cash they need to finance 35MM Balance sheet would have 2MM cash 4 containerships worth 60MM assume oil tankers worth 60MM purchase price less 35MM debtShares are 37MM assume dilution of preferred shares and some inevitable options pushes us close to 40MM Liquidation value is still 2 Now IF they can show nice profitability from those ships net of financing costs we will be looking good
